Ингредиенты для «Вкусные вареники»:
Свинина (голяшка) — 300 г
Курица (филе) — 250 г
Лук репчатый (1,5 шт. - в начинку; 1,5 шт. - для зажарки) — 3 шт
Бульон (мясной; 2 половника)
Перец черный (свежемолотый)
Соль (для теста и в начинку; по вкусу)
Мука пшеничная / Мука (для теста) — 500 г
Вода (для теста) — 300 г
Крахмал (для теста; можно брать как картофельный, так и кукурузный) — 2 ст. л.
Масло сливочное (для начинки) — 30 г
Масло растительное (для жарки)

****THIS GAME IS ADDICTED, MY FRIEND SUGGESTED AND I START PLAYING IT AND GUESS WHAT I AM LIKING IT VERY MUCH****
                                                                          **ABOUT THE GAME**
It has so many maps and modes to play stating from zero to a good skill rank is very much difficult but not impossible, as you progress your skills, game play and fun increases and than you will be liking it.
*** you team up with your friend and enjoy, from long round match to short round every match is full of fun and some times get more excited when both the team needs last round to win.  

                                                 *****FREE TO PLAY*****
its free to play but also has premium which is very much worth to  buy and collect cases and drops as well.

                                                *****PREMIUM******
The premium is 15$ and believe me its worth to buy it.
you will get drops, cases and graffiti art.

                                                 *****CASES******
every week you get one or two different types of cases such as skin cases, knife cases and glove cases.
you should open them with keys to collect skins, knife and gloves but they are rare to get.
or you should sell the cases in steam market or  trade it with friends for your desire skins or cases.

                                          *****DROPS*****
Every time you rank up you get reward with drop i.e  skin, case or graffiti drop.
same as cases you can uses them, sell them or trade them with friends.

To be honest this reward system excites you to play more and more.  

                          **THIS IS MY OPINION YOU MAY AGREE OR DISAGREE**
